3:I[61343,[],""]
0:["F0DdrqAE1mJ5qvBLwte8Z",[[["",{"children":["lesson",{"children":["tailwind",{"children":["layout",{"children":["flex",{"children":["flex-1",{"children":["__PAGE__",{}]}]}]}]}]}]},"$undefined","$undefined",true],["",{"children":["lesson",{"children":["tailwind",{"children":["layout",{"children":["flex",{"children":["flex-1",{"children":["__PAGE__",{},[["$L1",["$","div",null,{"className":"text-left","children":[["$","h1","h1-0",{"children":"css flex 1 1 0%"}],"\n",["$","p","p-0",{"children":"在CSS中，flex是flex-grow, flex-shrink 和 flex-basis的缩写。\n这三个属性定义了flex项在flex容器内的行为。"}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-0",{"children":"flex-grow属性"}],"\n",["$","p","p-1",{"children":"定义了flex项相对于其他flex项的放大比例，默认为0，即即使容器内有剩余空间，项目也不会放大。"}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-1",{"children":"flex-shrink属性"}],"\n",["$","p","p-2",{"children":"定义了flex项相对于其他flex项的缩小比例，默认为1，即如果空间不足，该项目将缩小。"}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-2",{"children":"flex-basis属性"}],"\n",["$","p","p-3",{"children":"定义了在分配多余空间之前，项目占据的主轴空间（main size）。"}],"\n",["$","p","p-4",{"children":"所以，\"1 1 0%\" 表示 flex-grow 为 1，flex-shrink 为 1，flex-basis 为 0%。"}],"\n",["$","h1","h1-1",{"children":"解决方案："}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-3",{"children":"使用flex-grow属性："}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-0",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":".item {\nflex: 1; /* 等同于 flex: 1 1 0%; */\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-4",{"children":"使用flex-shrink属性："}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-1",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":".item {\nflex: 1 1; /* flex-basis默认为0%，所以可以省略 */\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-5",{"children":"使用flex-basis属性："}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-2",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":".item {\nflex: 1 1 0%;\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","p","p-5",{"children":"以上代码表示该flex项在容器中的放大比例为1，缩小比例也为1，并且基础大小为0%。这意味着即使容器空间不足，flex项也会缩小来填满空间，且当容器有多余空间时，flex项也会放大来占满空间。"}]]}]],null],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children","tailwind","children","layout","children","flex","children","flex-1","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children","tailwind","children","layout","children","flex","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children","tailwind","children","layout","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children","tailwind","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound
